userStory: As a student I can watch the lecture after the class so that I can revisit important points that I missed in class.
As student I want to view the syllabus so that I can prepare for next classes topic.
As a student I can download lecture slides so that I can study the slides when I don't have an internet connection.
As an instructor I want to post announcements so that I can reliably disseminate important messages to the entire class.
As a student I want to use the view grades so that I can assess how hard I have to work for the remaining assignments.
